tool_description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application
name: Shazam API
title: Shazam API

api_list.name: charts/get-top-songs-in-world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shazam-api7.p.rapidapi.com/charts/get-top-songs-in-world"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shazam-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://shazam-api7.p.rapidapi.com/charts/get-top-songs-in-world"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shazam-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
